abstract: Potash has been contacted by China’s Sinochem Group and Brazil’s Vale as the Canadian company battles a hostile $39 billion takeover offer from BHP Billiton, Bloomberg reported on Monday.
snippet: Potash has been contacted by China’s Sinochem Group and Brazil’s Vale as the Canadian company battles a hostile $39 billion takeover offer from BHP Billiton, Bloomberg reported on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Potash was contacted by China’s Sinochem Group and Brazil’s Vale as the company tries to fend off a hostile takeover from BHP Billiton, said a person with knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: Sinochem and Vale Said to Contact Potash

abstract: It’s time for BHP Billiton to roll out the charm. The company seeking to acquire Canada’s Potash Corp. via a $39 billion hostile bid will attempt to convince Canadian regulators and Potash shareholders that its bid is properly valued.
snippet: It’s time for BHP Billiton to roll out the charm. The company seeking to acquire Canada’s Potash Corp. via a $39 billion hostile bid will attempt to convince Canadian regulators and Potash shareholders that its bid is properly valued.
lead_paragraph: It’s time for BHP Billiton to roll out the charm. The company seeking to acquire Canada’s Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan via a $38.6 billion hostile bid, will this week attempt to convince Canadian regulators and shareholders in the fertilizer company that its bid is properly valued.

headline.main: BHP to Woo Canadian Authorities This Week

abstract: The board of Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan urged shareholders to reject BHP Billiton’s hostile $38.6 billion offer.
snippet: The board of Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan urged shareholders to reject BHP Billiton’s hostile $38.6 billion offer.
lead_paragraph: The Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, the fertilizer producer, confirmed on Monday that it was seeking bids to counter an unsolicited $38.6 billion offer from BHP Billiton, the Australian mining company.

headline.main: Potash Producer Says It Is Talking to Buyers Other Than BHP
headline.print_headline: Potash Producer Says It Is Talking to Buyers Other Than BHP

abstract: Potash, seeking to thwart a hostile $38.6 billion takeover bid by the mining giant BHP Billiton, says it has been in talks with third parties.
snippet: Potash, seeking to thwart a hostile $38.6 billion takeover bid by the mining giant BHP Billiton, says it has been in talks with third parties.
lead_paragraph: Potash, seeking to thwart a hostile $38.6 billion takeover bid by the mining giant BHP Billiton, says it is looking for possible counterbids.

abstract: Forget about one possible white knight for Potash as it tries to fend off a hostile bid from BHP Billiton. Vale, the big Brazilian mining company, denied that it was in talks to acquire the giant Canadian fertilizer company.
snippet: Forget about one possible white knight for Potash as it tries to fend off a hostile bid from BHP Billiton. Vale, the big Brazilian mining company, denied that it was in talks to acquire the giant Canadian fertilizer company.
lead_paragraph: Forget about one possible white knight for Potash. Vale, the big Brazilian mining company, denied on Monday afternoon that it was in talks to acquire the giant Canadian fertilizer company.

headline.main: Vale Denies It Is Potash’s White Knight
